rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Currículum vitae
Currículum vitae
Curriculum vitae
Currículum vitae
Curriculum vitae
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A document used and created by a person to present their background, skills and accomplishments.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Currículum vitae
Currículum vitae
Curriculum vitae
Dominis científics
Áreas científicas
Domaines scientifiques
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This ASIO vertical module organizes hierarchically the scientific domains related to research projects as established by Spain's Agencia Estatal de Investigación, depending from the Ministerio de Economía y Competitividad.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Scientific domains
Dominis científics
Áreas científicas
publication citations
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: a property to link a given publication to the number of citations.
A centre at which higher education and research is conducted.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Universidade
Universidade
Université
Unibertsitate
University
Universitat
Universitat

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A code is assigned to a concept.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: code of
Grupo de investigación
Group de recherche
Research group
Grup de recerca
Grup d'investigació
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A group of researchers often from the same centre, specialised on the same subject, working together on the issue or topic.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Grupo de investigação

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The end date of the project.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fecha final proyecto
project end date
Empresa spin-off
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A division of a company or an organization that becomes an independent business with assets, employees, intellectual property, technology, or existing products taken from the parent company.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Empresa derivada
Empresa derivada
Corporate spin-off
Société scindée
Empresa derivada
Spin-off enpresa

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una organització amb personalitat jurídica, la qual disposa dels mitjans necessaris per a la producció i es dedica a combinar-los per obtenir béns o serveis destinats a l'intercanvi.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Empresa
Company
Entreprise
Empresa
Empresa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Uma organização com personalidade jurídica, a qual dispõe dos médios necessários para a produção e obtenção de bens ou serviços destinados ao intercâmbio.
A corporation or business organization which makes goods (in a broad sense) in an organized manner and sells them to the public for profit.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Empresa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Una organización con personalidad jurídica que dispone de los medios necesarios para la producción y se dedica a combinarlos para obtener bienes o servicios destinados al intercambio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Empresa
National project
Projecte nacional
Projecte nacional
Projeto nacional
Proyecto nacional
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A project developed and funded at the national level.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Projet national
cites
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: a property to indicate that a document cites another one.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: co-advises
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A person co-advises an academic publication (bachelor thesis, master thesis or doctoral thesis).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: International project
Projecte internacional
Projet international
Proyecto internacional
Projeto internacional
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A consortium project integrated by partners from diverse countries beyond the scope of the European Union.
A reference law that establishes a position.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: reference law
Event
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An arbitrary classification of a space/time region, by a cognitive agent. An event may have actively participating agents, passive factors, products, and a location in space/time.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: profiles
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property relates people and the featured profiles.
A generic class which may include a conference series, a course section, a seminar series, or a workshop series. When possible, use one of these more specific classes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Event series

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Any kind of thesis (bachelor's, master's, PhD) produced to receive some sort of university degree.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Tesi
Tesi
Tesi
Thesis
Tesis
Thèse
Tese
Tese
Funding programme
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A programme of related funded projects, typically established by a funding organization.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Dissertação de mestrado
Treball de fi de màster
Mémoire de maîtrise
Mémoire de maîtrise
Dissertação de mestrado
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A thesis reporting a research project undertaken as part of a second-cycle course of education to receive a master's degree.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Traballo de fin de máster
Master's thesis
Trabajo de fin de máster
Treball de fi de màster
Tesis de maestría
Tesis de maestría
Tesis de maestría
Tese de mestrado
Tesis de maestría
Grade universitaire
Grau acadèmic
Unibertsitate-gradu
Grau acadêmico
Grau acadèmic
Grau académico
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A qualification awarded to students upon successful completion of a course of study in higher education.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Grade universitaire
Grade universitaire
Academic degree
Grao académico
Título académico
Grade universitaire
Grade universitaire

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A key word of the project.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: project keyword
palabra clave
Research object
Objecte de recerca
Objeto de investigación
Objeto de investigação
Objecte de recerca
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A research object aggregates a number of resources. A resource can be a workflow, web service, document, data item, data set, workflow run, software or a research object.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Objet de recherche
Publication
Publicación
Publication
Publicación
Publicació
Publicação
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Content made available to the general public. In the case of ASIO, often scientific or academic contents published.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Publicació
Division d'université
Divisió d'universitat
Divisió d'universitat
División de universidad
Divisão de universidade
University division
División de universidade
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A division within a university (school, faculty, etc.)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has ISBN10
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: International Standard Book Number (ISBN) 13
International Standard Serial Number
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has ISSN

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An undergraduate academic degree awarded by colleges and universities upon completion of a course of study lasting three to four years (depending on institution and academic discipline).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Licenciatura (pós-Bologna)
Títol de bàtxelor
Título de grado
Títol de grau
Bachelor's degree
co-advised by
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An academic publication (bachelor thesis, master thesis or doctoral thesis) is co-advised by an advisor.
A property to express the i10-index of an author.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: i10-index
Projecte regional
Regional project
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A project developed and funded at the regional level.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Projet régional
Proyecto regional
Projeto regional
Projecte regional
País
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A region legally identified as a distinct entity in political geography.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Pays
Country
País
Herrialde
País
País

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property relates roles and their requisites, i.e. other roles.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: requires
Bachelor's thesis
Treball fi de grau
Trabayu de fin de grau
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A thesis reporting a research project undertaken as part of an undergraduate course of education to receive a bachelor's degree.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Trabajo de fin de grado
Mémoire de fin de licence
Treball fi de bàtxelor
Segell de qualitat
Sello de calidad
Selo de qualidade
Label qualité
Seal of quality
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A graphic mark indicating highest levels of quality in research, often measured in terms of relevant publications related to the researching activity.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Segell de qualitat
Report
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A document describing an account or statement describing in detail an event, situation, or the like, usually as the result of observation, inquiry, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: was derived from
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A derivation is a transformation of an entity into another, an update of an entity resulting in a new one, or the construction of a new entity based on a pre-existing entity.
A financial plan for a defined period that may also include planned sales volumes and revenues, resource quantities, costs and expenses, assets, liabilities and cash flows.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Presupuesto
Orçamento
Budget
Orzamento
Pressupost
Aurrekontu
Budget
Pressupost

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A book integrated by a compilation of documents published from an event, such as a conference.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Proceedings
Entitats administratives
Entités administratives
Entidades administrativas
Entitats administratives
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This vertical module in ASIO models all the relevant administrative bodies ("Administración Autonómica") of Spain's Autonomous Communities (conserjerías, departamentos, secretarías) that might have a role (funding, participating) within the development of a given project. It is modeled hierarchically through the relevant administrative levels thereof.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Administrative entities
Entidades administrativas
project start date
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The start date of the project.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: fecha inicio proyecto
Proyecto europeo
Projecte europeu
Projecte europeu
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A project developed and funded at the European level.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: European project
Projeto europeu
Projet européen

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: International Standard Book Number (ISBN) 10
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has ISBN13
Entidades geopolíticas
Entités géopolitiques
Geopolitical entities
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This vertical module in ASIO models all the geopolitical/administrative levels (from municipalities, to provinces, regions, countries and European-level entities) that might have a role in the ontological architecture of the project. It is modeled hierarchically though relevant administrative levels potentially funding projects. In the Asio project the proof of concept is carried out with the whole administrative levels of Spain, Portugal, Andorra and France, in addition to the relevant European administrative entities.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Entidades geopolíticas
Entitats geopolítiques
Entitats geopolítiques
has research line
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: a property linking organizations or groups with scientific domains

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Conference
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A meeting for consultation or discussion. [Source: http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/Conference]

rdf:Description.dc:creator: Emilio Rubiera Azcona
rdf:Description.dc:description: An ontology to address the Research Management of the CRUE's Spanish University System (Sistema Universitario Español) by applying an encompassing model not only capable of addressing the universities of the CRUE but also more belonging to the European Union.
rdf:Description.dc:title: The ASIO ontology

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An establishment founded for doing research.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Centro de investigação
Centre de recerca
Centre de recherche
Research institute
Centre d'investigació
Centro de investigación
Patente
Patente
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A form of intellectual property that gives its owner the legal right to exclude others from making, using, selling and importing an invention for a limited period of years, in exchange for publishing an enabling public disclosure of the invention.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Patent
Patent
Patent
Patent
Patente
Patente

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A person is the main researcher in a given project.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: main researcher participant
Catalog
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A list of items in a collection; an ordered compilation of item descriptions and sufficient information to afford access to them.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Spain's university staffing
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This ASIO vertical module defines Spain's University staffing model encompassing all its specificities.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Pequena e média empresa
Petite ou moyenne entreprise
Small and medium-sized enterprise
Petita i mitjana empresa
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A company whose personnel numbers fall below certain limits.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Pequeña y mediana empresa
Petita i mitjana empresa
student
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A person studies or studied in a university.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Conference poster
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The digital file (or physical equivalent), if available after the conference, vs. the act of attending/presenting.
A product as outcome of a project.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Product
h-index
A property to express the h-index of an author.
coordinated by
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: inverse property of 'project coordinator'

A condition/status/position that can be predicated of a person. In the ASIO core ontology, roles are reified as first order individuals and relations between roles and players are expressed by means of the asio:plays property. The ASIO core ontology does not impose any subclassification of roles. The concept is open to be refined according to domain or application requirements.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Papel
Papell
Role
Papel
país
country
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property indicates the nationality of a resource. The domain is not set so unpredicted resources within the ontology could be attached to countries.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: plays
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property relates roles and their players, who can be any foaf:Agent (a person, a group, etc.)
an organisation (i.e. university) is associated with another organsiation (i.e. research institute).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: associated with

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The PubMed ID (PMID) identifies a citation record (rather than full-text) in the PubMed database. It is not evidence of compliance with the NIH Public Access Policy, because it does not identify a full-text submission of any kind.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has PubMed ID

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A person is granted with a stipend for researching.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is granted with
objetivo de proyecto
project objective
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A defined objective of the project.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: geodivision
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A property to link a resource to a predefined geographical (or geopolitical) division.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Project budget
Orçamento de projeto
Budget de projet
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The budget established or devoted to a project.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Pressupost de projecte
Pressupost de projecte
Presupuesto de proyecto
project coordinator
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A property to link an agent (person or organisation) with a project in the role of coordinator.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: at context
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property enables to relate a profile with a given context (geographical, temporal, spatial, social, etc.).

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Tese de doutoramento
Doktore tesi
Tesi doctoral
Tesis doctoral
Doctoral thesis
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A thesis reporting a research project undertaken as part of an undergraduate course of education to receive a doctoral degree.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Tesi doctoral
Tese doctoral
Thèse doctorale
capital
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A property to indicate that a place is the official seat of government in a political entity.
Recorded audio in any format.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Audio document
awards
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An object property linking an agent to something the agent awards, for example linking a funding agency to a grant, a university to a degree, or an organization to a prize. [source: cerif/frapo]

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Workshop
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A seminar, discussion group, or the like, that emphasizes zxchange of ideas and the demonstration and application of techniques, skills, etc. [Source: http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/Workshop]

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Collected document
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A document consisting of collections of previously published works.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: a proerty to link a person to a publication as a reviewer.
reviews

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property encodes the participation relation between profiles and the communities they are member of.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: participates

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A class to represent a qualified value as used in Wikibase.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Qualified value
has Code
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A concept can be asigned a code.

a property to link a project to any outcome obtained within its endeavour, including publications, patents, products, prototypes, etc. The domain of this property is obviously the class foaf:Project but the range is left open so to encompass unforeseen project outcomes.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: project outcome

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: In ASIO, a temporary research endeavor undertaken to achieve defined objectives.
Profile

A profile represents a particular person playing a given role. In the specialised literature it is also known as a "qua-individual". The ASIO core ontology extends the meaning of profile to capture "person-as-role", "person-at-context" and "person-in-community".
Perfil
Perfil
A role is personalized by means of a profile, which wrap the role in the identity of the person behind the profile.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: personalizes

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A qualitative descriptive research study of individuals or a group.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Case study
Manual
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A book of instructions or guide to a specific topic.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Context
Contexto
Context
Contexto
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Contexts are similar to situations or state of affairs providing interpretation coordinates for profiles. In the most simple case, these coordinates are just geographical/spatial or temporal coordinates. The ASIO core ontology does not impose a fixed definition of context. It is deliberately wide in order to enable third-parties the adequation of the meaning of context according to their modeling needs and requirements.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: qualified valuation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A given value linked to a given date (point in time) within a qualified value.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Prototype
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A product prototype
Audiovisual recording in any format
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Audio-visual document

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This property allows to specify which is the user profile that is active, given a interaction between two applications.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is active
author citations
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A property to link the number of citations to a given author.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has PubMed Central ID
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A PMCID is a unique PubMed Central reference number, which is assigned to each full-text record made available A PMCID is a unique PubMed Central reference number, which is assigned to each full-text record made available in PubMed Central. The PMCID is issued shortly after the PI or author approves the PubMed Central formatted web version of the submission.
An abstract that is published as a standalone document or in a journal of abstracts.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Abstract
qualified date
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A given date (point in time) linked to a given value within a qualified value.
This property allows to express hierarchies of roles, through of role specialization: if role A specializes role B, and B specializes C, then role A specializes role C.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: specializes
Event organiser
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A role of organising cientific events, such as conferences, workshops, etc.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Grant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A financial award provided by a funding organisation for a particular project or purpose, usually awarded on the basis of a competitive application.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has TRL
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A prototype has a given technology readiness level
